output.sentences: When I saw the  firemen, I knew there had been an accident.
A lot of rescue workers from several townships were called in to help.
The car's door was totalled, because the vehicle was smashed from the side.
The workers had to prepare the vehicle to possibly extract any survivors.
After the crash, the vehicle remained stuck behind the truck.
